name: babylonjs-editor-main
description: Babylon.js Editor is a Web Application helping artists to work with Babylon.js

scripts.postinstall: electron-rebuild -f -w node-pty -m ./node_modules/node-pty && electron-builder install-app-deps && rm -rf template/node_modules/babylonjs-editor-tools && node ./postinstall.mjs
scripts.build: yarn build-tools && yarn build-editor && yarn build-quixel
scripts.build-all: yarn build && yarn build-template && yarn build-website
scripts.package: yarn && yarn clean && yarn lint && yarn build && yarn test && node build.mjs
scripts.clean: rm -rf editor/build editor/declaration editor/electron-packages editor/coverage quixel/build quixel/declaration tools/build tools/declaration tools/coverage template/.next website/.next
scripts.test: yarn workspace babylonjs-editor-tools test && yarn workspace babylonjs-editor test
scripts.coverage: yarn workspace babylonjs-editor-tools coverage && yarn workspace babylonjs-editor coverage
scripts.lint: yarn lint-editor && yarn lint-tools && yarn lint-quixel && yarn lint-template  && yarn lint-website
